participant_2.background:
I live a very active life, but I always make time for my family.
I love Halloween because it's a time to be creative and have fun.
I am a student who is trying to quit smoking for the sake of my baby.
i like to write my own songs.
I'm insecure about my eating habits.

content.text: What's your favorite thing to do?
I love to be creative and Halloween is my favorite time of year!
That's great! I love Halloween too! I just love dressing up and getting to be someone else for a day.
Same! I love to go all out with my costumes.
Me too! I've been working on my Halloween costume for weeks!
Awesome! What are you going to be?
I'm not sure yet! I'm thinking about being Harley Quinn, but I'm not sure yet.
Harley Quinn is a great choice! She's so fun and colorful.
Yeah, she's my favorite! I love her personality.
I love her too! She's so crazy and fun.
Exactly! I can't wait to start working on my costume.
Awesome! I hope you have a great Halloween!
